- You can now like other answers and see who liked yours
- Zoom out uploaded pictures/videos when creating new answers
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Introducing DIRECT CHAT: now you can chat privately with your friends!

- News feed redesign. It is even easier than before to discover new people and interesting content.
- Now we show “Featured answers” on your news feed. Make cool posts and answers and we will feature them to millions of users.
- See who is nearby and ask them questions.
- Add song to your profile.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Introducing SUPER REQUESTS. Send a super request and increase your chances 8x to be friends!
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Share F3 link to unlock requests. Every time a friend opens your link you can unlock one request.
- Post a topic: your friends will send you messages to your topic
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

F3 now is a lot more fun! You can send photos and videos as questions to your friends!
F3 now is a lot more fun! You can send photos and videos as questions to your friends!
F3 now is a lot more fun! You can send photos and videos as questions to your friends!

- We have redesigned share screen so you get more photo and video questions. Try to share it with your friends on other social networks.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Use "Ask my followers" if you want to send your question to all your followers at once.
Use "Ask my followers" if you want to send your question to all your followers at once. Bug fixes.

- Reactions. New way to interact with your friends.
- Astrological compatibility. Will you be friends forever?

- Reactions. New way to interact with your friends.
- Astrological compatibility. Will you be friends forever? (Bug fixes)

- Red button. Once a day you can press the red button and all your followers will receive a notification on their phones that you are online now and ready to reply to their questions.
- Send us your video question and probably we’ll publish it as a question of the day.
- Are you or someone you know ready to become a rising star of F3? We love creative people and we want to promote them to F3 community. If you think your or someone else’s content could be interesting to F3 users, please let us know.
- Add your TikTok link in profile.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Red button. Once a day you can press the red button and all your followers will receive a notification on their phones that you are online now and ready to reply to their questions.
- Send us your video question and probably we’ll publish it as a question of the day.
- Are you or someone you know ready to become a rising star of F3? We love creative people and we want to promote them to F3 community. If you think your or someone else’s content could be interesting to F3 users, please let us know.
- Add your TikTok link in profile.
(Bug fixes)

- Add interests to your profile to find like-minded people and get relevant questions
- Add #tags to your questions to get answers from people interested in this topic
- Add #tags to your answers
- @mention your friends in your answers
- Inbox has several sections: Personal, My Interests, All Interests and Nearby
- Now you can allow to send you only direct personal questions which are addressed only to you and to no one else

- Now you can see all replies to questions in My interests, All interests and Nearby
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
